modName: Polar Sisters Maya and Stella - Light and Dark mages
summary: Maya Starlight, a light mage, and Stella Blackmoon, a dark mage, are two mages who utilize the light and dark magic from the Colorful Magic mod by 184Gesu in order to decimate foes. Sorry, nothing special like custom voices or quests. Just two followers with unique magic. The followers can be found in the MOORSIDE INN in Morthal
descriptionHtml:
Maya Starlight, a light mage, and Stella Blackmoon, a dark mage, are two mages who utilize the light and dark magic from the Colorful Magic mod by 184Gesu in order to decimate foes. Sorry, nothing special like custom voices or quests. Just two followers with unique magic. Also, they use whatever body mod is installed and used by other NPCs. The followers can be found in the MOORSIDE INN in Morthal

Requires DAWNGAURD and COLORFUL MAGIC by 184Gesu. Make sure you only get version 1.14 or above. However, be aware that version 1.2 requires dragonborn as well, but dragonborn isn't required for this mod.

You can get Colorful Magic here: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37440/?

[img]http://i.imgur.com/8b2UG84.png [/img]

Likes: Demonology, raves, wine, night time, Metallica, Yousei Teikoku, Slayer, The Encyclopedia of Demons and Demonology (or Deadra if you wish to be lore friendly), Dark chocolate covered straberries.
Magic: Light based i.e.: Grand cross and Healing

[img]http://i.imgur.com/g5rVx4I.png[/img]

Likes: Angels, reading, classical music, milk, day time, Mozart, Bach, Small petite tart cakes.
Magic: Dark based i.e.: Darkness Fire

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Credits:
Colorful Magic by 184Gesu : http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37440/?
Enhanced Character Edit by ECE team
Opulent Outfits - Mage Robes of Winterhold by babooncru
Demon Hunter Armor by jmenaru
Demon Hunter Armor Retexture by Stealthic Khaos
Ashara Princes of the Woods for UNP and male by SydneyB
